Class MaltSentence

java.lang.Object
  se.vxu.msi.malteval.corpus.MaltSentence

public class MaltSentence
extends java.lang.Object

Class for representing a sentence.

Author:
Jens Nilsson (jens.nilsson@msi.vxu.se)

                    int i,
                    java.lang.String p,
                    java.lang.String u,
                    java.lang.String d,
                    double score,
                    double time)
Constructor for creating a new MaltSentence object when the words/tokens are still unknown.

Parameters:
nOfw - Number of words
i - Sentence id
p - Parser name
u - User name
d - Date
score - The score of the sentence
time - The parsing time of the sentence

Parameters:

i - Sentence id
p - Parser name
u - User name
d - Date
score - The score of the sentence
time - The parsing time of the sentence

discard

public boolean discard(int min,
                       int max)
Is the sentence inside or outside the interval specified by min and max

Parameters:
min - The lower border (sentences of length min are inside the interval
max - The upper border (sentences of length max are outside the interval. max = 0 represents positive infinity.
Returns:
true of the sentence is outside the interval, and false otherwise.
